attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current degree classifications are unfair and don’t accurately demonstrate the ability of each individual student. 
Currently most gradutes are gaining a 2.1. However, they have a major difference in ability.
The university classifications need to be re-assessed. 
This would ensure hardworking students receive the recognition they deserve. Is it really fair that students who gain A’s and B’s end up with the same classification as those gaining B’s and C’s?
